byline.original: JEAN MAYER, Harvard University, School of Public Health

docs.lead_paragraph: I am sure that Dr. Joseph Feldschuh, who commented on my article "The Best Diet Is Exercise" -- a title which I feel was misleading -- in Letters" of May 16, is too experienced a physician not to understand clearly the difference between preventive and curative medicine.
